Please select the option that most closely reflects how much you agree with the following statements. 

"During this conversation I felt..."

rows.text: If I made a mistake, the other people in the group would hold it against me.
The other people in the group were able to bring up problems and tough issues.
The other people in the group sometimes rejected others for being different.
It was safe to take a risk with the other people in the group.
It was difficult to ask the other participants for help.Â
No one would deliberately act in a way that undermined me and my efforts.
My unique skills and talents were valued and utilized while working with the other people in the group.
